{{DISPLAYTITLE:Polyobj_DoorSwing}} {{Special|7|po, speed, angle, delay|Polyobject|DoorSwing}}
Rotates a polyobject, waits, and then rotates it in the opposite direction until it has returned to its original orientation.
* ''po'': polyobj to move * ''speed'': how quickly to spin the polyobj * ''angle'': [[Definitions#Byte_angles|byte angle]] to rotate the polyobj through * ''delay'': delay in tics before returning to original orientation
By default, the polyobj rotates in a counter-clockwise direction.
Using this function in ACS, or when using [[Universal Doom Map Format|UDMF]], you can reverse that direction by supplying a negative value to the speed parameter.
